## Load Libraries

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("ggridges")
library("RColorBrewer")
```

## Load Data

```{r}
df <- read_csv("../_raw/project_data.csv")
head(df)
```

## Save loaded data

```{r}
write_tsv(df, "../data/01_dat_load.tsv")

df <- read_tsv("../data/01_dat_load.tsv")
head(df)
```
